On the January 28 edition of Fox News' Fox& Friends, the co-hosts began a segment on the solvency of Social Security by playing a clip of Sen. Bernie Sanders ( I-VT) telling Fox News host Neil Cavuto , I think it is not a good idea for us as a nation to try to frighten people and say,` Social Security is not going to be there for you. Social Security is going bankrupt,' which is obviously not the case. Co-host Steve Doocy responded by saying,`` Oh, really?''
